name: Impossible Maze (Impossible Lab)
description:
Impossible Maze is a minimalist puzzle game. You may have heard the word "impossible triangle", which is a triangle intepreted as a single solid object by our visial system, but cannot exist as one in real life. In this game, you will manipulate a cube through a "impossible maze".

Introduction:

Your eyes can deceive you.

You thought you saw two adjacent and connected cube on screen, but they may be actually 10 cubes away. You saw a pattern, but rotate it, and you just see a scattering of points.

Can you manage to the goal in this impossible world? It's a maze which will amaze you!

Features:

- Over 100 levels to discover!

- Generage and explore in a random maze

- Gallery mode: reveal the original color while traversing the maze, is it your favorite painting?

- Guide mode: follow the color to the goal, challenge your color sense!

- More modes/features to come...
